_meta.description: Two approaches to achieve CN=8-9: partial diffusion and dimer design
lessons_from_r5: Fixed TB-citrate complex successfully maintained coordination
Best design r5_b_hbond_011 achieved CN=2 at 4A (target: 6 from protein)
H-bond conditioning on citrate oxygens helped positioning
Need 4 more protein donors to reach CN=8-9

strategy.approach_a: Partial diffusion from R5 best to add coordinating loops
strategy.approach_b: Homodimer where each chain provides ~3 coordinating residues
strategy.approach_c: Longer contigs with stricter H-bond conditioning

_meta.target: CN >= 6 from protein (total CN=9 with citrate)
_meta.api_format_note: select_fixed_atoms keys must be ChainIDResID format (e.g., X96, L96)

r6_a_partial_resample._description: Partial diffusion from R5 best design - resample loops to add coordinators
r6_a_partial_resample._hypothesis: Starting from working scaffold, partial_t allows adding more coordinating loops
r6_a_partial_resample._notes: partial_t=0.5 keeps core structure, resamples 50% of backbone. R5 output has ligands at residue 96.

r6_b_partial_aggressive._description: More aggressive partial diffusion (partial_t=0.7) for larger changes
r6_b_partial_aggressive._hypothesis: Allow more backbone resampling to enable larger loop insertions

r6_c_dimer_symmetric._description: Homodimer - each chain provides ~3 coordinating residues (total 6)
r6_c_dimer_symmetric._hypothesis: C2 symmetric dimer naturally places 6 donors around metal
r6_c_dimer_symmetric._notes: Two 50-70 residue chains, each contributing to coordination. Input has ligands at residue 1.

r6_d_denovo_extended._description: De novo with longer scaffold and aggressive H-bond conditioning
r6_d_denovo_extended._hypothesis: Longer scaffold (110-130) allows more space for coordinating residues
